It's an unhinged one,'' said Jim Cantiello about the entertaining, unpredictable shenanigans pulled out by Steven Tyler in the first two nights of audition episodes this week. Truth be told, I never realized how much I missed Paula[ Abdul] last year. Steven Tyler 's colorful language, zany metaphors and deafening jangly man-jewelry was just the entertaining wild card the two-night premiere needed to give it a must-see facelift. Jim Cantiello was glad that the new trio, which also includes sole returning judge Randy Jackson , didn't fall into the same old`` mean Simon Cowell '' and`` too-nice Paula'' tropes.
